name: Parmesan Chicken Bites
description: The best chicken nuggets you will ever have - crisp-tender and completely homemade with Parmesan goodness!
recipeIngredient: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts (cut into 1-inch chunks)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Season chicken with salt and pepper, to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Season chicken with salt and pepper, to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine Panko, Parmesan, garlic powder and smoked paprika; season with salt and pepper, to taste. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine Panko, Parmesan, garlic powder and smoked paprika; season with salt and pepper, to taste. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Working in batches, dredge chicken in flour, dip into eggs, then dredge in Panko mixture, pressing to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Working in batches, dredge chicken in flour, dip into eggs, then dredge in Panko mixture, pressing to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken to the skillet, 5 or 6 at a time, and cook until evenly golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chicken to the skillet, 5 or 6 at a time, and cook until evenly golden and crispy, about 3-4 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with Parmesan and parsley, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with Parmesan and parsley, if desired.

review.reviewBody: Great flavor! I baked the bites at 450 for 20 min and they came out perfect. Spray pan with a little ebooks and on top as well. Nice and crispy.

Hi Kathy, I have frozen these nuggets in the past. I flash freeze them for about 4-5 hours. Place in an air tight container or freezer bag.

Using a non stick cooking spray product, spray  a wire rack and place on top of a cookie sheet. Place the chicken frozen nuggets on top and bake for about 20 to 25 minutes at 325 to 350 degrees.

They come out really quite tasty and I also make chicken strips the same way so rather than cut the chicken into cubes just cut them up into strips hope you like this, enjoy!
